    public class Domain
extends Synonyms
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Domain linked to operations that can be performed Can be a sensor, an actuator or a generic API as the weather is

        Build a Domain from a JSON, if the JSON is not properly formatted the given object will have id=NoDomain? and words={NoWords?}
